title: Kan inthen hnu kha Lal Isua avangin
lyrics:
Kan inthen hnu kha Lal Isua avangin,
Tunah hian mi nung damin kan inhmu;
Hlim tlang leh thurualin inkhawm ilangin,
Khawhar hnu, hlimin i lawm leh ang u.

Isuan min hualhum tawn tawh avangin,
Ama hming faka inkhawmin lawm ilang;
Mihring mai chuan kan lawm a kim zo lo thin,
Thlarau thianghlimiin min thlamuan fo vang.

Vanah Lal hnena inkhawm beisei ila,
Chatuan ro hlu chu hmuh tum ilangin;
Pa leh mihringte hmuha fel i tum ang,
Kan Lal, kan unau an nih avangin.

Hemi khawvelah thawk rim rih mah ila,
Khitah a rah kan hmuh dawn avangin;
A zuitute hetah lungngai mah ila,
Khitah a hnen kan thlenin kan lawm ang.
